intro: Fumaria tenuifolia, commonly known as slender fumewort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Fumariaceae. It is a herbaceous annual that typically grows to a height of about 30–60 centimeters. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers that are clustered in dense, elongated racemes. Its leaves are alternate, simple, and often have a slightly hairy texture. Native to Europe and parts of Asia, it thrives in disturbed soils and is often found in meadows and along roadsides.
